005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark;
007
008import com.vladsch.flexmark.ext.typographic.TypographicQuotes;
009import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.HtmlRenderer;
010import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.HtmlWriter;
011import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.renderer.NodeRenderer;
012import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.renderer.NodeRendererContext;
013import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.renderer.NodeRendererFactory;
014import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.renderer.NodeRenderingHandler;
015import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.FlexmarkHtmlConverter;
016import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.HtmlMarkdownWriter;
017import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.HtmlNodeConverterContext;
018import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.HtmlNodeRenderer;
019import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.HtmlNodeRendererFactory;
020import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.HtmlNodeRendererHandler;
021import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.Parser;
022import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.block.NodePostProcessor;
023import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.block.NodePostProcessorFactory;
024import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.DoNotDecorate;
025import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Document;
026import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Node;
027import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.NodeTracker;
028import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.data.DataHolder;
029import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.data.MutableDataHolder;
030
031import org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
032
033import java.util.Collections;
034import java.util.Set;
035
036import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
037import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
038
039public class HtmlQuoteTagExtension
040    implements Parser.ParserExtension, HtmlRenderer.HtmlRendererExtension,
041    FlexmarkHtmlConverter.HtmlConverterExtension {
042
043  /**
044   * Construct a new extension instance.
045   *
046   * @return the instance
047   */
048  public static HtmlQuoteTagExtension newInstance() {
049    return new HtmlQuoteTagExtension();
050  }
051
052  @Override
053  public void rendererOptions(MutableDataHolder options) {
054    // do nothing
055  }
056
057  @Override
058  public void parserOptions(MutableDataHolder options) {
059    // do nothing
060  }
061
062  @Override
063  public void extend(HtmlRenderer.Builder rendererBuilder, String rendererType) {
064    rendererBuilder.nodeRendererFactory(new QTagNodeRenderer.Factory());
065  }
066
067  @Override
068  public void extend(Parser.Builder parserBuilder) {
069    parserBuilder.postProcessorFactory(new QuoteReplacingPostProcessor.Factory());
070  }
071
072  @Override
073  public void extend(FlexmarkHtmlConverter.Builder builder) {
074    builder.htmlNodeRendererFactory(new QTagHtmlNodeRenderer.Factory());
075  }
076
077  static class QTagNodeRenderer implements NodeRenderer {
078
079    @Override
080    public @Nullable
081    Set<NodeRenderingHandler<?>> getNodeRenderingHandlers() {
082      return Collections.singleton(
083          new NodeRenderingHandler<>(DoubleQuoteNode.class, this::render));
084    }
085
086    protected void render(@NonNull DoubleQuoteNode node, @NonNull NodeRendererContext context,
087        @NonNull HtmlWriter html) {
088      html.withAttr().tag("q");
089      context.renderChildren(node);
090      html.tag("/q");
091    }
092
093    public static class Factory implements NodeRendererFactory {
094
095      @Override
096      public NodeRenderer apply(DataHolder options) {
097        return new QTagNodeRenderer();
098      }
099
100    }
101  }
102
103  static class QuoteReplacingPostProcessor
104      extends NodePostProcessor {
105
106    @Override
107    public void process(NodeTracker state, Node node) {
108      if (node instanceof TypographicQuotes) {
109        TypographicQuotes typographicQuotes = (TypographicQuotes) node;
110        if (typographicQuotes.getOpeningMarker().matchChars("\"")) {
111          DoubleQuoteNode quoteNode = new DoubleQuoteNode(typographicQuotes);
112          node.insertAfter(quoteNode);
113          state.nodeAdded(quoteNode);
114          node.unlink();
115          state.nodeRemoved(node);
116        }
117      }
118    }
119
120    public static class Factory
121        extends NodePostProcessorFactory {
122      public Factory() {
123        super(false);
124        addNodeWithExclusions(TypographicQuotes.class, DoNotDecorate.class);
125      }
126
127      @NonNull
128      @Override
129      public NodePostProcessor apply(Document document) {
130        return new QuoteReplacingPostProcessor();
131      }
132    }
133  }
134
135  static class QTagHtmlNodeRenderer implements HtmlNodeRenderer {
136
137    @Override
138    public Set<HtmlNodeRendererHandler<?>> getHtmlNodeRendererHandlers() {
139      return Collections.singleton(new HtmlNodeRendererHandler<>("q", Element.class, this::renderMarkdown));
140    }
141
142    protected void renderMarkdown(Element element, HtmlNodeConverterContext context,
143        @SuppressWarnings("unused") HtmlMarkdownWriter out) {
144      context.wrapTextNodes(element, "\"", element.nextElementSibling() != null);
145    }
146
147    public static class Factory implements HtmlNodeRendererFactory {
148
149      @Override
150      public HtmlNodeRenderer apply(DataHolder options) {
151        return new QTagHtmlNodeRenderer();
152      }
153    }
154
155  }
156
157  public static class DoubleQuoteNode
158      extends TypographicQuotes {
159
160    /**
161     * Construct a new double quote node.
162     *
163     * @param node
164     *          the typographic information pertaining to a double quote
165     */
166    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ConstructorCallsOverridableMethod")
167    public DoubleQuoteNode(TypographicQuotes node) {
168      super(node.getOpeningMarker(), node.getText(), node.getClosingMarker());
169      setTypographicOpening(node.getTypographicOpening());
170      setTypographicClosing(node.getTypographicClosing());
171      for (Node child : node.getChildren()) {
172        appendChild(child);
173      }
174    }
175  }
176}
